name: Hair Challenge: Hair game, dye
description:
Hair Challenge: Hair Game, Dye is a challenging game for girls and all ages. Ready for fun to play this addictive hair challenge adventure game. This is a Super fun hair challenge game with long colored hair. There are many challenging scissors, Blades and all other obstacles to keep gorgeous hair from getting hair cut and hair dye in this game.

If you like to color your hair then you must try this game for fantasy. In this game there is a girl with short hair who will run on the track and change her hair colors.

This is popular and fun, addictive games than other running challenging apps.
